docs.snippet: People generally believe hitching takes no particular know-how, but it takes a tremendous amount of skill to travel quickly, safely and in the right direction like Juan Villarino.

headline.main: The World’s Best Hitchhiker on the Secrets of His Success

docs.snippet: As the list of endangered animals worldwide grows longer, society may soon be faced with an impossible decision: which ones to take off life support.

headline.print_headline: Should Some Species Be Allowed to Die Out?
headline.main: Should Some Species Be Allowed to Die Out?

docs.snippet: A startling variety of art ranging cross three millenniums will be on exhibit at museums around the country this spring.

headline.main: From 12th Century B.C. to 2017, Art in Startling Variety
